techmeme.title: OpenAI has appointed BlackRock exec Adebayo Ogunlesi to its board; last year, BlackRock acquired Ogunlesi's company Global Infrastructure Partners for ~$12B (Rachel Metz/Bloomberg)
Draft of an EO called "Strengthening and Promoting Innovation in the Nation's Cybersecurity" that Biden may issue this week lists 52 actions agencies must take (Cynthia Brumfield/CSO)
Biden signs an EO that directs the DOD and DOE to lease land to companies building gigawatt-scale AI data centers and clean power facilities, and more (Justine Calma/The Verge)
The US, Japan, and South Korea issue a joint statement saying North Korean-backed hackers stole $659M+ in crypto heists in 2024 and were behind the $235M WazirX (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
Meta plans to cut about 5% of its lowest performers with the intent of backfilling their roles this year, according to an internal memo sent to employees (Riley Griffin/Bloomberg)
